vars.description: Get to know Hans-Peter Dietz. Full-Stack anything coder, unix guy, bass player and motorcyclist.
View projects of Hans-Peter Dietz. gulp-embed-json, gulp-embed-svg, gulp-minify-inline-json, the rovers, ng-async-img, js-performance, ngAnimatedScroll, htmlelement.polyfills, Qake, Ask The Crowd.
View publications by Hans-Peter Dietz. Ansible.tar.gz, Controlled Chaos: Randomization in Level Design, Ask The Crowd: Crowdsourcing Knowledge Generation, Implicit Authentication on Mobile Devices.
